sentence: 127 ||| Discussion ||| 6.17 ||| The complementary meta-analysis showed borderline signifi cant risk reduction of 34% of using the combination of aspirin and clopidogrel over either drug used as monotherapy for the combined outcome of all stroke, TIA, acute coronary syndrome, and all-cause death.
